creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
Hi,

in http://httpd.apache.org/dev/, in § "Source Repository Information", the link against "The latest source tree pulled from the svn repository" seems to be dead (http://cvs.apache.org/snapshots/)

Best regards

creator: humbedooh@apache.org
text: Not only is the link no longer working, the perl script below it seems to go back to the 1.3 era. I think we should just scrap those two lines and be done with it, or possibly add a link to dev/dist instead.
I have scrapped the links to the defunct CVS repo now. Closing this ticket with thanks to Christophe :) We should probably look at what we can offer instead.
creator: humbedooh@apache.org
